module.exports = function(node) {
 
  var path = [];
  var p    = node.parentNode;
  var c    = node;
 
  while (p) {
 
    path.unshift(Array.prototype.indexOf.call(p.childNodes, c));
    c = p;
 
    p = p.parentNode;
 
    // virtual nodes - must be skipped
    while (p && p.nodeType > 12) p = p.parentNode;
  }
 
  return path;
};
